CustomField.formula: Is_Falcon__c =false && (SLA_Name__c = "CBUD CB" || SLA_Name__c = "Best Effort" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched" || SLA_Name__c = "2BD" || SLA_Name__c = "CompB" || SLA_Name__c = "ZZ DO NOT USE Over 48 Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "NBD" || SLA_Name__c = "ZZ DO NOT USE 24 to 48 Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched Short Notice AH Under 24 hrs" || SLA_Name__c = "Sched Short Notive AH 24 to 48 hrs" || SLA_Name__c = "(none)") && ArrivalWindowEndTime >= NOW() && ArrivalWindowEndTime <= NOW()+0.5/24 && (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Open") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Tentative") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Dispatched") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Rejected") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Accepted") || ISPICKVAL(Status,"Enroute"))
CustomField.label: Non MTTR Late to be On Site
